name: nugget
short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 10000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A nugget of pure gold. Can be sold at a high price.
flavor_text.emerald: A nugget of pure gold. Can be sold at a high price.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price.
